General.Name: Wataniya Insurance Company
General.Description: Wataniya Insurance Company offers a range of insurance products and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Marine, Property, Motor, Engineering, Accident & Liability, Extended Warranty, and Term Life segments. It offers various insurance products, including motor insurance; general accident and casualty insurance products comprising fidelity guarantee, money, personal accident, public liability, work injury compensation, medical malpractice, burglary, glass breakage, business all risk, business travel, and exhibition insurance products; and liability insurance, including general third-party liability, product liability, workmen's compensation/employer's liability, and professional indemnity. The company also provides marine cargo insurance products, including land transit, marine cargo, and marine hull insurance; employee benefits insurance; and engineering insurance products comprising contractor all risk, contractors' plant and machinery, electronic equipment, erection all risk, machinery breakdown, and deterioration of stock insurance. Further, it offers property insurance products comprising property all risk, fire and lightning, household comprehensive, and terrorism risk insurance; extended warranty coverage against damages to motor vehicles; and term life coverage against the insured's death. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: E.A. Juffali & Brothers H.O. Building, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21432
